title: I have all the ingredients to upgrade my Shen to lvl 6 BUT I can't upgrade to lvl 6, Uhmmm why?
body: requires 2 tokens and 1 permanent champion.. I have all of these what am I missing?

replies.body:
I think there might be some confusion over a permanent champion and a champion shard, permanent.  In order to unlock Mastery Level 6, you will need the mastery tokens as well as the champion shard as well.  For example, even though you own Shen already, you need the Shen champion shard.

If you do not have it already, we will be adding Champion Shards into the store that can be bought with IP or RP in the near future!

Let me know if you have any further questions!
I feel like that is something that should have been  released with the system instead of doing it separately and leaving the system unfinished.

Then why is there a difference between "2 tokens and 1 shard" vs. "2 tokens and 1 permanent" if you still need a shard regardless? Shouldn't there be only two options for upgrade? 2 tokens & 500 essence / 2 tokens & 1 champion shard? Am I the only one that finds this extremely misleading?

I think I might have explained myself fairly poorly (and may have been misinformed as well).  To unlock it, you just need the 2 mastery tokens and then one of the following:

* Champ Shard
* Champ Permanent
* 500 Blue Essence

However, the Champ Permanent is an actual piece of content in your Hextech Loot.  It isn't simply completely owning the champion.  I hope this explains things a bit more!

Let me know if you have any other questions!
